author: andrew_cleal
title: Adaptable railway set that now very collectable.
review:
This is a great crane for your lego railway.

With its long base - It can be adapted into a emergency line clearing or track-laying vehicle. 

These are all becoming harder to find in good boxes. They can currently go for Â£40.00 + on Ebay!

author: Crazy_Chris
title: Modern times
review:
Overview
Year of release: 1985
Last year in catalog: 1990
Set type: single wagon (big size)
Generation (within grey era): 3.0
Predecessor (within grey era): 7814
Successor (within grey era): none

Description
1985 saw the release of this new crane wagon. It looks more modern than 7814, e.g. the crane cabin has a roof now. But from technical view, it is less sophisticated. There is only one winch, and the angle of the crane arm is locked by a hinge plate construction. Fortunately, the model has support stands, this is a big improvement compared to 7814.

Variants and alternate parts
Early versions of the set use hinge plates with solid studs, while later versions use hinge plates with hollow studs.

Personal opinion
There are pros and cons. It looks good and works fine, but it lacks the rough charm of 7814.
